data.title: James Lecky
data.meta_description: 3 posts published by jameslecky during July 2015
data.text:
Detour – Martin M. Goldsmith Dirty Snow – Georges Simenon The Liquidator – John Gardner Elak of Atlantis – Henry Kuttner The Fourth Crusade – Jonathan Phillips Detour by Martin M. Goldsmith Something of a minor noir classic, Detour tells … Continue reading →

Another snippet of publishing news. My short story Cursed and Beloved has been accepted for the upcoming Sword and Sorcery Anthology from Robot Cowgirl Press. It’s part of a series of stories I’ve been working on lately featuring a character … Continue reading →

I am rather delighted to say that one of my short pieces – The Magnificat of Devils – has been accepted for the anthology Chilling Horror Short Stories, due from Flame Tree Publishing in August. Here’s the official blurb: This … Continue reading →
